```
gsettings set org.gnome.desktop.input-sources xkb-options "['ctrl:nocaps']"
```

```
wujie@pop-os ~> cat /etc/fancontrol 
# Configuration file generated by pwmconfig, changes will be lost
INTERVAL=10
DEVPATH=hwmon4=devices/platform/nct6775.656
DEVNAME=hwmon4=nct6791
FCTEMPS=hwmon4/pwm2=hwmon4/temp2_input hwmon4/pwm1=hwmon4/temp1_input
FCFANS=hwmon4/pwm2= hwmon4/pwm1=
MINTEMP=hwmon4/pwm2=40 hwmon4/pwm1=60
MAXTEMP=hwmon4/pwm2=70 hwmon4/pwm1=80
MINSTART=hwmon4/pwm2=30 hwmon4/pwm1=30
MINSTOP=hwmon4/pwm2=0 hwmon4/pwm1=0
MINPWM=hwmon4/pwm2=0 hwmon4/pwm1=0
MAXPWM=hwmon4/pwm2=150 hwmon4/pwm1=100

```

```
gsettings get org.gnome.desktop.peripherals.mouse speed 1.1

```
